text: Sara Mishara is an American-Canadian cinematographer,"Sara Mishara au RVQC: complice de la lumière". Le Devoir, February 26, 2019. who won the Canadian Screen Award for Best Cinematography at the 7th Canadian Screen Awards, for her work on the film The Great Darkened Days (La grande noirceur)."Cinq prix Écrans canadiens à La grande noirceur". La Presse, March 31, 2019. She was also a dual nominee in the same year for Allure,"Sara Mishara's cinematography is so arresting that she's competing against herself at the CSAs". CBC Arts, March 26, 2019. and was previously nominated in the same category at the 28th Genie Awards for Everything Is Fine (Tout est parfait)"Génie 2009 : ça intéresse-t-i quelqu’un ?". Voir, April 3, 2009. and at the 4th Canadian Screen Awards for Felix and Meira (Félix et Meira)."2016 Canadian Screen Awards nominees: ‘Rookie Blue,’ ‘Vikings,’ ‘Big Brother Canada’ nominated". Global News, January 19, 2016. Born in Boston, Massachusetts, she studied film at Concordia University and the Prague Film School. She is also a four-time Prix Jutra nominee for Best Cinematography, for her work on Continental, a Film Without Guns (Continental, un film sans fusil),"Sara Mishara : l'éclat de la nouvelle vague". La Presse, April 5, 2008. The Legacy (La Donation),"Jutra : liste des finalistes". La Presse, February 16, 2010. All That You Possess (Tout ce que tu possèdes)"Spotlight shines on Quebec cinema at the Jutra awards". CBC News, March 17, 2013. and Tu dors Nicole,"Dolan contre Dolan à la 17e Soirée des Jutra". Ici Radio-Canada, January 26, 2015. and for Best Screenplay as cowriter with Ivan Grbovic of Romeo Eleven (Roméo Onze). ==References== ==External links== * Category:21st-century Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian cinematographers Category:Canadian women screenwriters Category:Best Cinematography Genie and Canadian Screen Award winners Category:American emigrants to Canada Category:Concordia University alumni Category:People from Boston Category:Canadian women cinematographers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sara Mishara
